entry.title: The Gotham Promethus
entry.summary:
Author: up_tonogood

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,078Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 33

Summary: A reimagining of Mary Shelley’s Frankenstein: The Modern Prometheus, but the creature is Jason Todd. Dick Grayson sails into the Arctic, chasing whispers that his lost brother, Jason, may still walk the world of the living. You are a young artist, hired for an Arctic exhibition, who becomes entangled in a web of grief, rebirth, and a bunch of angsty monologues.

entry.title: The Bloom Knot
entry.summary:
Author: nocteris

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,383Chapters: 6/22Kudos: 56

Summary: “I suggest we ignore that it happened.” Your jaw physically dropped, “what?” “You got any soul marks on you?” You had already checked a million times, but you still removed your gloves to show him. Both ring fingers clean, you flexed them in his direction. “Same here,” he waved his already bare hands, clean as day. “So, we forget it ever happened unless some strange shit happens.” ——— Where you and Jason accidentally trigger the curse of soulmates— a curse that binds you to the first person you touch hands with. The plan was simple, to avoid each other. There was no way you—a STEM major, would cross paths with him anyway. So, what the hell were you doing in his Comparative Literature 121 lecture hall?

entry.title: Apartment 3B
entry.summary:
Author: ElaineInABox

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 28,044Chapters: 11/15Kudos: 474

Summary: You weren’t looking for love, just somewhere cheap, quiet, and safe enough to get you through the semester. Jason Todd wasn’t looking for company, just a roommate who wouldn’t ask questions about why he came home at two AM bloody and bruised.But in a cramped apartment in Crime Alley, between burnt coffee, leaky ceilings, and the soft hum of the city that never sleeps, the silence between you starts to change. What begins as survival becomes something quieter, steadier—something that almost feels like home.

entry.title: The story of how Jason Todd started to date a psychologist
entry.summary:
Author: DoraZeExplora00

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,471Chapters: 2/?Kudos: 0

Summary: It was the first autumn day in Gotham for 25 year old Riri. She wasn't expecting a warm welcome, but drizzling rain, gunshots and smog? Definitely not how she imagined her new life. Okay, the hundred percent humidity is something you get used to living in Saint-Petersburg, Russia, but gunshots and sirens all around. God, no.“Was I drunk when I decided to come here?” She asks herself, irritated. Indeed the perspective of changing the country by applying for a psychologist job in some unknown city was tempting, but goddamn. Now I know why they need someone without a lot of experience.

Summary: Jason was your everything. No matter how many years pass, you'll never recover from how he was taken from you. You still saw him, anywhere and everywhere. entry.title: delayed satisfaction is the sweetest
entry.summary:
Author: dreamtiming

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,614Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 28

Summary: “That’s why you keep asking to go on patrol with me, right? My cutting intellect?” He asks, dipping a fry from his takeout box in a pool of ketchup. You wonder if the splotch on his sleeve is from a rather exuberant dip, or if it’s blood from earlier. “Among other things.” You say, feeling like it’s finally your turn to offer someone an ambiguous response. Especially as he returns to this topic of conversation he is so insistent on having out with you. For emphasis, you take a great bite of your food to allot you more time to muster defenses. “What other things?” Jason presses, because it might work with someone else—but not him, who, with no protection of the mask to guide his face, bores his eyes into you. “Like the fact that you paid for the food.” You offer gleefully, both of you knowing this is unsatisfactory. “Can’t be the only thing.” He says, his tone surprisingly level. Why on earth is your heart beating so fast? tl;dr: stuck in the middle with you. Dick Grayson/Reader/Jason Todd

entry.title: I Left My Heart in Wynwood
entry.summary:
Author: xbeautifulxrealityx

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 790,882Chapters: 100/?Kudos: 821

Summary: A high-stakes heist in Miami should have been a straightforward job, but when you unexpectedly run into your insufferable ex, who makes you the offer of a lifetime.. things spiral out of control. Amidst a whirlwind of chaotic encounters and sizzling new flings, you’re pulled deeper into the lucrative world of alien tech development. As you juggle ambition, romance, and a web of deceit, every reckless decision sends shockwaves through your life. In a world where illusions rule and betrayal lurks at every turn, you must navigate a treacherous path to build your own empire and rise from the ashes of your past. Will you emerge victorious or be consumed by the chaos?No y/n used.*also I’ve started to edit/ rewrite some of the first chapters so yeah lol

entry.title: Can I bow my head down far enough (that hope hears my empty prayers?)
entry.summary:
Author: thenyoumightaswellwrestleangels

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,284Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 38

Summary: "You didn't decorate this year," Jason says flatly, and you inhale a bit at the feeling of being caught off guard. "Um… I didn't know if you would want to," is your gentle response, and he slouches down like you've burned him.
